lead_paragraph: Before the Rams left town in January, the St. Louis Blues were already in line to get an outdoor NHL stadium series game — just not the Winter Classic.

headline.print_headline: Blues-Blackhawks in Winter Classic Added After Rams Left
headline.main: Blues-Blackhawks in Winter Classic Added After Rams Left

snippet: Before the Rams left town in January, the St. Louis Blues were already in line to get an outdoor NHL stadium series game — just not the Winter Classic....
